name: Beat Sacrifice - LD43
description:
Simple prototype for LD43. Theme was "Sacrifices Must Be Made". The plan was to balance failures and make the game a lot more difficult than  it is. If you want to see the game over screen, spam the stab button. The loud clangs mean your doing it right. Another missing feature was different endings depending on how many people were spared and sacrificed by the time the BPM gets ridiculously fast.

X do do almost everything. R to restart from the game over screen. Esc to close the app when the game is playing.

Art by Pako - https://twitter.com/Okapook

Ground "art" and development by me

All sounds are CC0:

Game Over Music: "Bittersweet" by Emma_MA(https://opengameart.org/users/emmama)

Sacrifice spared "Thank You":  "Thank you (NPC, British Male)" by theuncertainman

Clang sound: "LightRingingClang.mp3" by wilhellboy

Sacrifice sound: "clap mix2.wav" by young_daddy

Beat sound: "kick_gettinglaid.wav" by DWSD
